    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Poišči magnetno  polje</string>
            <string language="en">Find the magnetic field</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Finden Sie das magnetische aufzufangen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trouvez le champ magnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontre o campo magnético</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trovi il campo magnetico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βρείτε το μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Encuentre el campo magnético</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Zanki v konstantnem magnetnem polju spreminjamo površino.</string>
            <string language="en">Area of a wire loop is changed inside a constant magnetic field.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">indukcija</string>
            <string language="en">induction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">faradayev zakon</string>
            <string language="en">faraday's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bereich einer Leitungsschlaufe wird innerhalb 
eines konstanten magnetischen auffangen geändert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La zone d'une boucle est changée à l'intérieur 
d'un champ magnétique constant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A área de um aro de arame é mudada dentro de um 
campo magnético constante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La zona di un ciclo di legare è cambiata 
all'interno di un campo magnetico costante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τον τομέα ενός βρόχου καλωδίων αλλάζουν μέσα σε ένα
σταθερό μαγνητικό πεδίο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El área de un anillo se cambia dentro de un campo
magnético constante.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Induktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz Faraday</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">induction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi de faraday</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">indução</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei de Faraday</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">induzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge del faraday</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επαγωγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος του Faraday</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">inducción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ley de faraday</string>
          </keyword>
